detail_desc: Chelsea boots in shiny leather with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings, leather insoles and patterned soles. Heel 3 cm.

Metal earrings, one with a shell. Length 2 cm and 4 cm.

Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 1 cm to 3 cm.

Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature. V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a seam with a wide tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
